Intro.title: Hi, I'm {name}
Intro.tagline: I'm a tech enthusiast with experience in programming. I develop software, build electronic projects, and continuously explore new technologies.

objectTracking.title: Object Tracking
objectTracking.description: A Python project using YOLO and ByteTrack for real-time object tracking with visualized trajectories and dynamic ID labels.

megakino.title: Megakino URL Finder
megakino.description: A tool that automatically searches and extracts Megakino page URLs to give users quick access to movies and series.

buecherei.title: Library Backend
buecherei.description: A backend solution for managing books, users and lending processes for a digital library.

fileToImage.title: File to Image
fileToImage.description: A tool that converts files into images to visualize or further process them.
